description: Catchwords is a variant on the popular "Catch Phrase" game. Players are shown commonly known words or phrases (ex: “Tarp”, “Cast your vote”) on the screen and must give hints to their team to guess the word without saying it themselves. While staying true to what made the original party game fun, Catchwords introduces many new elements to enhance the game experience. You can choose from multiple "wordpacks," enable/disable categories on the fly, and even limit the number of times players can hit the "Next" button during gameplay.  This free version of Catchwords is limited to 102 words, enough for one full game of play. Catchwords is a great party game that you can keep in your pocket. Whether you are hanging out around the house, waiting in lines with your friends for the latest movie or roller coaster, or anywhere you just need to entertain 4+ people, Catchwords can turn that boring time into a blast.
